publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-104 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Free School Meals—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to consider amending section 53 of the Education (Scotland) Act 1980 to extend entitlement to free school meals to all families receiving the new Tax Credits.

S1M-104 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Free School Meals—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to consider amending section 53 of the Education (Scotland) Act 1980 to extend entitlement to free school meals to all families receiving the new Tax Credits.
S1M-104 Free School Meals (lodged on 30 August 1999) Robin Harper*

S1M-104 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Free School Meals—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to consider amending section 53 of the Education (Scotland) Act 1980 to extend entitlement to free school meals to all families receiving the new Tax Credits. Supported by: Robin Harper
S1M-104 Free School Meals (lodged on 30 August 1999) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-104 Free School Meals (lodged on 30 August 1999) Brian Adam*
S1M-104 Free School Meals (lodged on 30 August 1999) Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-104 Free School Meals (lodged on 30 August 1999) Mr Lloyd Quinan*

S1M-104 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Free School Meals—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to consider amending section 53 of the Education (Scotland) Act 1980 to extend entitlement to free school meals to all families receiving the new Tax Credits. Supported by: Robin Harper, Dr Winnie Ewing, Brian Adam, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Lloyd Quinan
S1M-104 Free School Meals (lodged on 30 August 1999) Mr Adam Ingram*, Irene McGugan*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-104 Free School Meals (lodged on 30 August 1999) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-104 Free School Meals (lodged on 30 August 1999) Dennis Canavan*, Fiona McLeod*

S1M-104 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Free School Meals—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to consider amending section 53 of the Education (Scotland) Act 1980 to extend entitlement to free school meals to all families receiving the new Tax Credits. Supported by: Robin Harper, Dr Winnie Ewing, Brian Adam, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Irene McGugan, Christine Grahame, Linda Fabiani, Dennis Canavan, Fiona McLeod
S1M-104 Free School Meals (lodged on 30 August 1999) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-104 Free School Meals (lodged on 30 August 1999) Andrew Wilson*

S1M-104 Mr Kenneth Gibson: Free School Meals-That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Ministers to consider amending section 53 of the Education (Scotland) Act 1980 to extend entitlement to free school meals to all families receiving the new Tax Credits. Supported by: Robin Harper, Dr Winnie Ewing, Brian Adam, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Irene McGugan, Christine Grahame, Linda Fabiani, Dennis Canavan, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Ms Sandra White, Andrew Wilson, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-104 Free School Meals (lodged on 30 August 1999) Fergus Ewing*
